data.name: Limited Lifetime Corp
data.detailed_description:
Limited Lifetime Corp is a day by day management sim.

Harvest Resources




Deploy your excavators to multiple regions to gather resources. As your LLC grows, you can expand to many more regions.

Beware the Local Fauna




Not everything is happy about your operation... keep an eye on the shifting sands for any unwanted guests.
You can't be everywhere, so you can deploy automated lookouts to warn of you impending dangers, both real and imaginary.

Profit




At the end of the day, you receive the fruits of your labor. You can purchase more machines, upgrade them, and purchase more land rights.
But be warned, there are those jealous of your profits.

How Long Can Your LLC Survive?

data.short_description: Lead your LLC to its inevitable destruction in this day by day management sim. Harvest resources, make a profit, expand your Corp. But be careful; from the local fauna to the Syndicate, no one wants you to succeed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3.2 Ghz Quad Core CPU or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
